short_description: oimoya is a food producer based in kanoya, japan.
generated_description: oimoya materials is a company based in kanoya, kagoshima prefecture, specializing in the production and sale of baked sweet potatoes. the company offers a variety of products, including frozen baked sweet potatoes made from local yamato potatoes and red harukake, as well as other potato-based items such as potato chips and sweet potato cakes. oimoya materials emphasizes the use of high-quality ingredients sourced from their own farms and contract farmers, ensuring the authenticity and taste of their products. the company has been dedicated to its craft for over twenty years, providing a range of potato-related items for everyday consumption, as well as gifts and special occasions.
